description:
It works a lot better than the small number of reviews led me to expect. Or even the application icon, which gives me a good laugh every time I look at it. My friend and I nicknamed the poor little icon "Cord" (as opposed to Discord).

Whatever the case, it does exactly what I wanted, which was stream a game from my steam deck including the audio. 🎉
It lacks some features and is a bit laggy but it does stream audio. If it gets polished it will be even better than official discord client
The default Discord client doesn't work. This does. End of story.
summary: Better Than the Discord Client on Steam Deck

description: Scrolling is bugged, otherwise works fine
summary: Scrolling is bugged, otherwise works fine

description: its easy to use but you are not able to use discord rich pressence apart from that it does what it sets out to do

Pros
-No lag
-Less unused features (Better performance)
-60 fps streaming with audio at a great quality
Cons:
-Cannot minimize to a tray
-Lack of features
-UI is sometimes choppy when looking at settings

I've been daily driving this client pretty much the day it was added to Flathub and I'm absolutely in love. It has some quirks, at least on Nvidia (both for x11 and Wayland, different quirks for each though). But for what it's worth, it's exactly as they say; an experimental client with audiosharing. Can't believe these madmen did it before Discord themselves. The day the all the weird growing pain glitches get ironed out will make this client officially better than the official one in almost every way.
summary: Not perfect, but exactly as advertized

description: Es una solución ingeniosa pero a efectos practicos sería ideal que estuviera integrado en pulseaudio o pipewire como una entrada de sonido que no sea el microfono.
Thank you very match, this tool is solves fundamental discord problem on linux.

Как я понял, это просто веб-версия дискорда, но сделанная в виде приложения с поддержкой стримов. Поддерживаются разрешения от 240p до 2160p, от 15fps до 144fps. 

Из минусов: не всегда запускаются стримы. Приходится перезаходить. Стримы в 144fps ооочень редко работают (у меня 144hz монитор), но будем честны: они нахой не нужны. 
Веб-камера вообще не работает. Приходится перезаходить в обычный дискорд и ожидать эрекцию, из-за плавного скролла, естественно.
summary: Круто, даже мой любимый Wayland работает, но есть нюансы

description: приложение заебись, но иконка говно, переделывайте
